text: Analyze the provided image thoroughly and generate an exhaustive, meticulous description capturing every detail with pinpoint accuracy. ; prioritize thoroughness and precision over conciseness.. ((RESPONDE EN UN SOLO PARRAFO NO MAS DE 250 PALABRAS))

The image captures a woman lying face-up in a lush green meadow, her eyes closed and her head resting on a bed of vibrant pink flowers. The woman is wearing a light pink off-the-shoulder top, and her long, wavy brown hair cascades down her back and over her shoulder, partially obscuring her face.  She is illuminated by the warm glow of the setting sun, which creates a soft, ethereal ambiance.  In the background, a large waterfall tumbles down a rocky cliff face, creating a serene and picturesque backdrop. The image conveys a sense of tranquility and peace, highlighting the beauty of nature and the simple pleasures of life.
